term.title: neutron temperature

item.text: The temperature assigned to a population of neutrons when this population is approximated by a Maxwellian distribution.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1547 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
